about_the_game:
King Egeon: Decades ago, a mighty king once gave birth to twin sons: the great King Hamlet the Merciful, and Claudius the Merciless. These brothers would go on to establish competing schools for young royalty: Elsinore Royal Academy and Northcreek Military Academy.

Jealousy overtook Claudius, who murdered his own brother and took the Elsinorian Throne, shifting the balance of power between the two schools and staining the legitimacy of those that attended Northcreek.

Rose Week: A celebration where feats of strength are shown and limits are tested! Recently, this rivalry week between schools has become much more heated. Much more violent. Thus, the current headmasters of both schools have picked you to be among a group of students from both schools, tasked with improving relations. The fate of Northcreek may be the fate of everything.



  • Develop Relationships: Establish friendship, rivalries, and maybe even FORBIDDEN ROMANCES(?)!
  • Consequences!: New and old choices litter the base game, affecting the sequel! [EDITOR'S NOTE: This means that the base game will have new story flags for pre-existing scenarios]
  • Play as a stand-alone story or play through the first game over again and straight into this one!

HOW TO START THE DLC

Option A: Click on 'CG2' at the start of the game
Option B: Play to the end of the game, and it will ask if you'd like to continue. Say yes, and you will start the sequel.

Requires a fresh playthrough.
